org.jchassis.termctl
Interface StyledCharacterTerminal

All Known Implementing Classes:
TerminalController
public interface StyledCharacterTerminal

An interface to a terminal that allows the user to set the style of characters subsequently output to the screen. It is intended that this will be implemented by terminal controllers that support styled (e.g. bold, underscored, etc.) characters.

Copyright © 2003-2005 Sam Stainsby.
Verbatim copying and distribution of this entire generated javadoc document is permitted in any medium, provided this notice is preserved.

 void clearCharacterStyles()
